content: Hello! This is the XYZ home services assistant. How can I help you with your electrical needs today?
Hi, I have some flickering lights and a few outlets that don’t work.
Thanks for letting me know. May I have your name, please?
Thanks, George. Can you please provide your address so I can check if you’re in our service area?
Sure, I live at 742 Elm Street.
Great, George! You’re within our service area. When would be a good time for a technician to come by and check your electrical issues?
Actually, I’m moving soon, so I don’t think it’s worth it to fix things right now.
reason: Customer is moving soon and declines scheduling appointment.

content: I understand, George. If you need our services in the future, please don't hesitate to contact us. Have a safe move!
reason: Customer is moving soon and declines scheduling appointment.
